preferences.name: debugtoolupload
preferences.title: Share 'Debug My Connection' Tool Reports
preferences.description: Allow uploading of 'Debug My Connection' tool reports to our secure servers for network research. No data is shared with third parties.

preferences.name: homenetupload
preferences.title: Share 'Homenet Discovery' Tool Reports
preferences.description: Allow uploading of 'Homenet Discovery' tool reports to our secure servers for network research. No data is shared with third parties.

preferences.name: enablebaseline
preferences.title: Enable Performance Monitoring of Your System and Network Connections
preferences.description: Allow Fathom to system collect and network peformance metrics periodically on the background.

preferences.name: baselineupload
preferences.title: Share Performance Monitoring Reports
preferences.description: Allow uploading of performance monitoring reports to our secure servers for network research. No data is shared with third parties.

preferences.name: enablepageload
preferences.title: Enable Performance Monitoring of Pageload Times
preferences.description: Allow Fathom to monitor the pageload times of visited web pages.

preferences.name: pageloadupload
preferences.title: Share Pageload Performance Reports
preferences.description: Allow uploading of pageload performance reports to our secure servers for network research. No data is shared with third parties.

preferences.label: Show
preferences.name: whitelist
preferences.title: Whitelisted Domains
preferences.description: The identity of visited web pages is anonymized when uploading the page load performance reports excluding a small set of popular domains (e.g. google.com). You can review and edit the whitelisted domains here.

preferences.name: enablefathomapi
preferences.title: Enable Fathom API for Regular Web Pages
preferences.description: Enable Fathom APIs for any regular web page. Fathom will always ask your approval everytime before a page can access any of the Fathom features. Only allow pages you trust to access the Fathom API!
